name: HalloweenSounds
0:
”Alexa, open Halloween Sounds”
”Alexa, ask Halloween Sounds to play Haunted House”
”Alexa, ask Halloween Sounds to play Random”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: halloween sounds
des:
Halloween Sounds plays scary, creepy, and fun sounds for your trick or treat night or Halloween party. Get in the Halloween spirit with this entertaining skill.

Brought to you by the makers of the Top Rated "Sleep and Relaxation Sounds" skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
